Title: Last Christmas
Writer: Emma Thompson (story by), Greg Wise (story by), Emma Thompson (screenplay by), Bryony Kimmings (screenplay)
Actors: Emilia Clarke, Emma Thompson, Henry Golding, Michelle Yeoh
Plot: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Her last date with disaster? That of having accepted to work as Santa's elf for a department store. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.
